text: Ncojane or Nojane is a town in the Kalahari desert of Ghanzi District, western Botswana. It is located 20 kilometres from the border with Namibia, and it has both primary and secondary schools and a clinic. The population was 1,439 in 2001 census. ==References== Category:Populated places in Botswana Category:Ghanzi District
title: Ncojane
